name: The Spy Who Spooked Me
description:
This games initial concept was to take on the character of a spy who has been put into a coma of sorts by her arch Nemesis.

This has left the spy separated from her physical body forced to posses a defective Henchbot serving the Nemesis.

The end goal of the game would involve the ghostly spy breaking into her Nemesis' compound to get back her body and ultimately a big part of her identity.
